name: Mettaton's Minigame Corner
description:
Mettaton's Minigame Corner An Undertale Fan Game Controls
  • Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Action Button: Z
  • Cancel Button: X
  • Inventory: C

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Currently Unavailable due to crashesGame

The game consists of a hub world with a variety of things to do within it.

There are 4 minigames to play:

  1. Papyrus Tile Puzzle.
  2. Jetpack Minigame.
  3. Spear Dodging With Undyne.
  4. Hotland Grid Puzzle.

Along with minigames to play, you also have a battle arena in which you can battle monsters from the game. (Currently, the game only has the RUINS arena)

You can also complete quests. When you complete all quests, you unlock your biggest challenge...

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Developper's note

I had far greater plans for this game, but I'm starting my first semester in game design in less than a month and I have to practice on other projects.

There is no ending after the final boss, I have one in mind and I know how to implement it. If I ever implement it, which I wish to do, I'll implement it along with a SNOWY arena.

Please Leave a rating or a comment!
I worked really hard on this and whether you hate or enjoy it, any feedback is much appreciated!
